author: Shirley Halperin
title: Vegas or Bust? The Grammys’ Stay in Sin City Draws Mixed Reviews
description: “We’re all gonna get COVID.” That was the prevailing sentiment among music industry attendees who made the trip to Las Vegas for the 64th annual Grammy Awards. After two years of lockdown and the stop-starts of the 2022 edition of the show, it seemed many wer…
